title: The magic is gone
author: VD
content_html:
The Magic Negro appears to have reversed polarity:

Obama Calls Bloggers Liars for Accurately Reporting His Words

You know a candidate is in trouble when his best hope is to ball-gag his wife, his spiritual advisor and his own bad self.
